dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Green oil; Distillate oil; Anthracene fraction; Coal tar anthracene; Impure anthracene; High-boiling oil; Heavy oil; N/A for brands
Green oil; Distillate oil; Anthracene fraction; Coal tar anthracene; Impure anthracene; High-boiling oil; Heavy oil; N/A for brands
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Anthracene oil is a product flow that is characterized by its processing level as a complex mixture developed through coal tar distillation. It involves technical aspects such as fractional distillation treatment, compliance with relevant industrial standards, specific quality grade, application as a feedstock for producing other chemicals, and production route via coal tar distillation. It is typically used in the industrial setting for extracting anthracene, carbazole, phenanthrene, and other polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons. The description indicates whether it is a part of a production mix or a ready-to-use consumption mix, with its availability specified as either to consumers or at the manufacturer's plant, with details provided in a separated, comma-delimited list.
蒽油是通过煤焦油蒸馏开发的复杂混合物产品流，其加工程度明确。包括分馏处理、符合相关行业标准、特定质量等级、作为生产其他化学品的原料、以及通过煤焦油蒸馏的生产路线在内的技术层面。在工业领域，通常用于提取蒽、咔唑、菲和其他多环芳烃。该描述指出它是生产混合物的一部分或是现成的消费混合物，其可用性明确指定为面向消费者或在制造厂的位置，所有细节以逗号分隔列出。
